name: Dokodemo Hamster: Bi! Click Tanken-tai
overview: Dokodemo Hamster: Bi! Click Tankentai (Also known as Doko Demo Hamster B! Quick Club) is a point and click adventure game in which the player controls a cute little hamster that will start an adventure. To advance in the game the player have to examine each room of the game clicking different objects to discover the one that start a different game (like jigsaw puzzles, mini games and others). Once he solve the game in each room he can advance to the next one. The game features also 3 different mini games in which the player have to clean a dinosaur teeth avoid being bite by him, goin down a river in a boat trying to avoid rocks and fishes, and a third mini game in which there are some hamsters in a room at night and they have to remember the order in which 4 different kind of phantoms appears and them put the right order to advance in the mini game.
